General.Name: Water Ways Technologies Inc
General.Description: Water Ways Technologies Inc., an agriculture technology company, provides water irrigation and agriculture solutions to agricultural producers in Israel and internationally. It designs, supplies, installs, and maintains irrigation systems for application in various agricultural and aquaculture operations. The company offers DataWays, a precise irrigation system that enables agricultural operators to make data-driven decisions on how and when to irrigate their crops. It also sells irrigation equipment and components. Water Ways Technologies Inc. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 77 King Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5K 1G8
